## SettingsConfig type

Map of specific configs for settings. Settings that do not have a config will be auto-configured.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type SettingsConfig = Record<string, SettingConfig>;
```
<b>References:</b> [SettingConfig](./components.settingconfig.md)
